walkthrough.header.title: Get Started with Mind Reader
walkthrough.header.description: A walkthrough for you to get started
walkthrough.step.createPythonFile.title: Create a Python File
walkthrough.step.createPythonFile.descri: [Open](command:toSide:workbench.action.files.openFile) or [create](command:toSide:workbench.action.files.newUntitledFile) a Python file - make sure it's saved as ".py"
walkthrough.step.lineHighlighter.title: Track where you are
walkthrough.step.lineHighlighter.descrip:
Keep track of where you are by looking for the highlighted line.
**Tip**: You can customize the line highlighter's appearance and behavior in the settings.
ðŸ“• Check out our [Line Highlighter](https://github.com/kelsvilla/LegoMindstormsVSExtension/wiki/Line-Highlighter) page to learn more.
walkthrough.step.viewCommands.title: View all your commands
walkthrough.step.viewCommands.descriptio: Click on the "Mind Reader Actions" tab to view all commands
walkthrough.step.speechToCode.title: Write Code with Speech
walkthrough.step.speechToCode.descriptio:
Press ``CTRL + V`` or click on ``Voice-command.start Stream`` in Mind Reader Actions to start adding code by speech.
Try saying "Insert If Ladder" when its listening. Say "Exit" for it to stop listening.
ðŸ“• Check out our [Voice Command](https://github.com/kelsvilla/LegoMindstormsVSExtension/wiki/Voice-Command) page to learn more.
walkthrough.step.exploreFeatures.title: Explore other features
walkthrough.step.exploreFeatures.descrip: ðŸ“• Check out our [wiki](https://github.com/Kaiyan-Da-Man/Developer-Portfolio/wiki) to learn more about this extension.
